tha-ap211:0.3_0: are the most senior monkey, the middle and the junior ones.
tha-ap211:1.2_0: the world is attached to the world,
tha-ap211:1.4_0: who stayed in that consummate ones.
tha-ap211:2.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap211:2.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
tha-ap211:2.4_0: to the teaching of the Buddha.
tha-ap211:3.2_0: there were four hundreds of fifty.
tha-ap211:3.3_0: She has sent back to the beginning:
tha-ap211:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap211:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kappāyana.
tha-ap211:6.1_0: The ninth part of the senior monks is applied.
